blogs.author: Daniel Nkurkunzinza
blogs.title: The Rise and Fall of Wekenzunze
blogs.body: We live in a time and season where all the people of the world are very skeptical and afraid of what is to come. No one really knows what that is going to be but it is really going to be fun to take a look at it without all of the prejudices of the society.

blogs.author: William Kamkwamba
blogs.title: How do I know she will keep quite
blogs.body:
There are some cases where you might want to decouple the container breakpoints from the screens values, there are different ways to do this:

Non-documented container.screens property

The containerâ€™s code in Tailwind CSS actually calls a container.screensproperty before default back to the global screens, you can see the code here. I actually found this on stackoverflow so wanted to give proper credit.

Based on this, and taking the Tailwind config example above, we could do something like:
